General.Name: Sam Hwa Capaci
General.Description: SAMWHA CAPACITOR Co.,LTD manufactures and sells capacitors in South Korea. It offers multi-layer ceramic capacitors, disc ceramic capacitors, EMI filters, beads and inductors, disc varistors, shunt power capacitors, and energy storage capacitors. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
